title: Breathing All The White Man's Air: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode (RE-RELEASE)
itunes:title: Breathing All The White Man's Air: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode (RE-RELEASE)
description:
This is a RE-RELEASE of Mothaf*ckin Mini Episode! Want your conspiracy theories your family has told you mentioned on the podcast? Send us your voice memos and emails to mymommapod@gmail.com and drop a review!: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/my-momma-told-me-with-langston-kerman/id1523712290

Langston answers a listener's conspiracy theory about the positioning of Black people's noses.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
